page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT AND INDUSTRY
page.content:
As stated previously the majority of people commute daily to their place of work, either to the outlying districts as part of the service infra-structure associated with local hospitals, schools, shops, etc., or alternatively travelling further afield to the commercial and industrial sectors of Hinckley, Nuneaton or Leicester. Employment is however available within the area with farming as undoubtedly the major source.
Industrial sites within the area include Naneby Hall Quarry, which employs ten people and is currently operated as a screening plant for processing sand and gravel, an adjacent concern involved in the production of ready mixed concrete and finally, a small company making low volume pre cast concrete products.
